ch0045_00_tsukushi/0101_0701_01_10:
Hiya, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m so glad
you’re here! I’ve been waiting for you.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0101_0701_02_10:
I wanted to show you the results of
all the new research I’ve been doing!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0701_01_10:
A lot of people think Bug-type Pokémon,
like Weedle and Kakuna, are creepy.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0701_02_10:
They don’t understand how awesome
and cute Bug-type Pokémon really are!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0701_03_10:
When they evolve, sometimes they look
completely different than they did before!
It never gets old!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0702_01_10:
They can go from a superhardened
chrysalis to sprouting big,
beautiful wings!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0702_02_10:
Don’t you find that super mysterious?!
Oh boy, I’d love to expand my circle
of Bug-type Pokémon enthusiasts!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_01_10:
When I go to the library, I can never
reach the books on the upper shelves,
no matter how far I stretch.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_02_10:
I wish I could use String Shot!
I could grab a book from up high
and pull it right into my hand!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_03_10:
You know what would be even cooler?
If I had beautiful wings to fly with,
like my Bug-type Pokémon...
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_04_10:
I wish I could evolve, like
Metapod or Kakuna.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0702_01_10:
Maybe, when I grow up, I’ll completely
change my shape, too—just like
a chrysalis!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_01_10:
When I grow up, I wanna be just like
the world-famous Pokémon professor,
Professor Oak!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_02_10:
I wanna be super knowledgeable about ALL
Pokémon, not just Bug-type Pokémon!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_03_10:
Oh boy! If I could do research alongside
Professor Oak someday, that would be a
dream come true.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_04_10:
That’s why I’ve gotta study,
study, study so I can make
that happen one day!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0702_01_10:
I’ll be rooting for your dreams to
come true, too!
Let’s work hard together!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0702_02_10:
It’s better to have a goal in sight
than to run around recklessly.
At least, that’s what I think.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0701_01_10:
When I was back in Johto, one of the
Pokémon I focused my research on
the most was Scyther.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0701_02_10:
They zip around reeeally fast,
so it was extremely hard to catch one.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0701_03_10:
Then again, the challenge made me
that much happier when I did manage
to finally catch one!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0702_01_10:
Most people tend to focus on its
razor-sharp scythes...
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0702_02_10:
but the way Scyther’s beautiful green
color blends into the grass and trees
is also pretty amazing, if you ask me.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_01_10:
Do you think there’s a Legendary Pokémon
out there that’s a Bug type?
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_02_10:
If you ever hear any rumors about one,
promise you’ll tell me!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_03_10:
I’d search high and low all over the
world if it meant I could meet a
Legendary Bug-type Pokémon.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_04_10:
A-and if I did, I’d be the most
excited bug catcher in the whole
wide world!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0702_01_10:
If you’re searching for a Pokémon,
you should never give up! One will
appear eventually—if you keep at it!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0702_02_10:
That’s pretty much the
story of my life!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0701_01_10:
I found something neat when I was
out catching some bugs.
Here, you can have it!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0701_02_10:
Don’t worry about it! It’s just a little
token of thanks for all the things you
do for me.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0702_01_10:
Sometimes I catch more than just
Bug-type Pokémon in my net...
ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0702_02_10:
like handy items and stuff!
I’ll be sure to share what I
find with you!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0701_01_10:
If someone were to ask me why I love
Bug-type Pokémon so much...I...I’m not
sure how I’d answer that.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0701_02_10:
They’re beautiful, they’re cool,
they’re tough! And, and...
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0701_03_10:
and there are so many amazing things
about them that I don’t think I could
list them all if I tried!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0702_01_10:
Sometimes, it’s hard to explain
why you love something.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0702_02_10:
That’s why I want to show everyone,
not just tell them, how awesome my
Beedrill is! I want them all to see it!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0702_03_10:
When you see Beedrill’s giant stingers
and sharp, powerful attacks, it’ll be
love at first sight!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0701_01_10:
Whenever we have a conversation, I feel
like I just babble nonstop about
Bug-type Pokémon and nothing else.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0701_02_10:
Are you good at listening?
You’re so easy to talk to.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0701_03_10:
I hope we can keep talking to each
other like this—as friends! That would
make me really happy!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0702_01_10:
I really like you and I really like
Bug-type Pokémon, so I always want to
tell you all about them!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0702_02_10:
If you have anything that you
really like, you can tell me all
about it, too!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/3001_0701_01_10:
Up and at ’em! Those Bug-type Pokémon
aren’t gonna research themselves!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/3002_0701_01_10:
Good morning. It’s so early. How do you have
so much energy? I’m still sleepy.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey! Do you want to take a little nap
before heading out?
ch0045_00_tsukushi/3004_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon! The weather is so nice.
We should go do some nature observation!
ch0045_00_tsukushi/3005_0701_01_10:
Gee, look at the time!
Sometimes I get so caught up in my research,
I don’t realize how late it’s getting.
ch0045_00_tsukushi/3006_0701_01_10:
Wow, you’re out late tonight! Maybe I should put
in a few extra hours of research myself!
